contest-event.event-date: Feb. 12, 1978 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Comedy Overture Durham University, Durham Prizes - 1st £30 and trophy, 2nd £20 and cup, 3rd £15 and trophy. 9 bands competed.
